description: This file defines a LightningJS component called 'Loader' which displays animated circles as a loading indicator. It imports the LightningJS Blits library, defines the component's template, properties, state, lifecycle hook, and methods for animation.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component that shows animated circles as a loading indicator, with customizable color.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates an interval that toggles the 'alpha' state property to animate the fade-in and fade-out effect of the circles.
